properties.label: Top Field
properties.name: topField
properties.description: The field by which top records are sorted

properties.label: Results Number
properties.name: topSize
properties.description: The maximum number of top records sorted by "Top Field" in result

properties.label: Ignore NULL Field
properties.name: ignoreNull
properties.description: Whether to ignore records with null in the field by which records are sorted. Defaults to "false" to treat null as smallest value.
